title: Kindly Identify the Font :)
content:
Hello,

Can anyone please identify the fonts.  
I thought that the fonts are " [Carniola](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161052/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Carniola%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=f99d3ad250d033cba6e14b8bcade8eff&wrap=2&text=MMKElectrical) " but they aren't.

the capital "M" is wonky in those fonts.

Thank you in anticipation.

Regards,  
Hasnain

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mmk_6168.jpg)

Font: 

 Times Roman 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161052/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125
